DOC.brief_summary: This protocol allow treatment 100 men two group ( placebo active treatment ) 22-70 year age mild ( IIEF EF 17 25 baseline ) vasculogenic erectile dysfunction least 6 month duration low intensity extracorporeal shock wave therapy utilize Dornier Aries 2 device .
DOC.brief_title: Dornier Aries 2 Extracorporeal Shock Wave Device Treatment Mild Erectile Dysfunction ( ED )
DOC.detailed_description: This trial prospective , randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind pivotal study , open-label extension . The study include 4 site multiple investigator . A total 100 men least 6-month history ED respond PDE5 inhibitor enrol . The trial comprise two arm achieve equal characteristic , patient randomly assign active treatment sham treatment . All patient active treatment receive LI-ESWT treatment use Dornier Aries 2 . Patients assign placebo group receive Dornier Aries 2 treatment use sham applicator . The time two treatment 6-7 day allow angiogenesis perfusion improvement occur . The subject ' duration participation total 34 week Subjects also ask maintain current level sexual activity participate study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Consent participate . 2 . Age 2270 year . 3 . Presence Vasculogenic Erectile Dysfunction least 6 month . 4 . Having response PDE5i . 5 . IIEFEF score ≥17 ≤30 take PDE5i . 6 . IIEFEF score ≥17 ≤25 wash PDE5i . 7 . In stable heterosexual relationship three month duration . 8 . Sexually active agree suspend ED therapy duration study . 9 . Agree maintain normal sexual habit . 1 . Radical prostatectomy . 2 . Previous radiation therapy pelvis . 3 . Previous stem cell platelet rich plasma therapy . 4 . Previous pelvic surgery judgment investigator could impact erectile function radical prostatectomy , radical cystectomy , Peyronie 's disease surgery , penile lengthen penile cancer surgery . 5 . Untreated Hypogonadism demonstrate abnormal testosterone level . 6 . Hormone usage , testosterone , clomiphene thyroid medication . 7 . Use cocaine , cannabinoids , opiate , barbiturate , amphetamine , benzodiazepine demonstrate drug screen . 8 . Psychogenic ED . 9 . Peyronie 's Disease penile curvature negatively influence sexual activity . 10 . Current anticoagulation therapy significant hematological condition demonstrate abnormal value complete blood count . 11 . Liver disease demonstrate abnormal chemistry panel coagulation value prothrombin time ( PT ) along derive measure prothrombin ratio ( PR ) blood test . 12 . Abnormal serum testosterone level . 13 . Patients cardiac noncardiac electrical device implant . 14 . Anatomical neurological abnormality treatment area . 15 . Diabetes Mellitus severe polyneuropathy . 16 . Patients generalize polyneuropathy irrespective cause . 17 . Refusal suspend ED therapy duration study . 18 . Men deem healthy enough participate sexual activity . 19 .
